history.narrative: Law 15-185, the “Retail Incentive Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-306, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 6, 2004, and May 4, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 21, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-435 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-185 became effective on September 8, 2004.
